create.title: Pull Request
create.subtitle: Creates a new pull request for {{repositoryName}}

diff.notSupported: Diffs for pull request are not supported by the type of repository

scm-review-plugin.no-requests: No pull requests matching the selected criteria found

confirm-alert.title: Merge Pull Request
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to merge?

confirm-alert.title: Reject Pull Request
confirm-alert.message: Do you really want to reject this pull request?

show-pull-request.targetDeleted: The target branch has been deleted!

contextModal.title: Original Context
contextModal.message: This is the original diff context at the time of comment creation

confirmDeleteAlert.title: Delete comment
confirmDeleteAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the comment?

confirmDoneAlert.title: Mark as done
confirmDoneAlert.message: Do you really want to mark this task as done?

confirmMakeTaskAlert.title: Create a task from this comment
confirmMakeTaskAlert.message: Do you really want to make this comment a task?

reopenAlert.title: Mark as NOT done
reopenAlert.message: Do you really want to reopen this task?

makeCommentAlert.title: Make this a normal comment
makeCommentAlert.message: Do you really want to transform this task to a normal comment?

confirmCancelUpdateAlert.title: Cancel Update
confirmCancelUpdateAlert.message: Do you really want to reject the modifications on the comment?

systemMessage.merged: The pull request has been merged.
systemMessage.rejected: The pull request has been rejected.
systemMessage.sourceDeleted: The source branch of the pull request has been deleted.

outdated.label: outdated
outdated.title: The comment is related to an older of the source or target branch
outdated.titleClickable: The comment is related to an older of the source or target branch. Click here to see the original context.

commentPullRequest.description: May add comments to pull requests

modifyPullRequest.description: May modify the title, the description and the reviewers of the pull request itself and modify/delete comments from other users

mergePullRequest.description: May merge or reject pull requests (merge needs additional permission to push the repository)
